entry.title: Ubuntu Breezy-Badger
entry.summary:
Not sure why I took this pics, but the fact is, Ubuntu Live CDs were shipped to you for free. I had tons of thousands of these CDs in my home.

At that time I was using a K6-II 500 with 64MB RAM and running Conectiva Linux Live CD 0.5. Both conectiva and ubuntu didn't support my 56K PCI modem, but it was funny spending time with it trying to make simple things work.

Old but gold!
